user.title: Set up Spotify Statistics
user.description: Enter your Spotify username and polling intervals. After submitting, you'll be redirected to Spotify to authorize access.

data_description.now_playing_interval: How often to check what's currently playing (30-300 seconds)
data_description.recently_played_interval: How often to check recently played tracks (300-3600 seconds)

abort.already_configured: This Spotify account is already configured
abort.missing_credentials: Application Credentials not configured. Please go to Settings → Devices & Services → Application Credentials (⋮ menu, top right) and add your Spotify Client ID and Client Secret first. Then restart Home Assistant and try again.
abort.oauth_error: OAuth authorization failed. Please try again.
